title: Marbled Pumpkin Cheesecake
ingredients: ['180g crushed ginger nut biscuits', '60g finely chopped pecans', '75g butter, melted', '450g cream cheese, softened', '150g caster sugar, divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs', '250g pumpkin puree', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
